name: cte
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for chronic traumatic encephalopathy: a brain condition thought to be caused by being hit on the head repeatedly or by having had concussion (= temporary damage to the brain) several times: People who have repeated head trauma are at risk for CTE. CTE is considered by some to be the most serious health problem in modern day boxing.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat are the symptoms of CTE?CTE is more common in professional rather than amateur boxers.CTE can only be definitively diagnosed in an autopsy after the person has died.
